__e: We promised each other we wouldn't abandon it until...
I thought you said we weren't gonna see each other again.
We agreed. We'd all be in line. So that the men would know we meant business and know that we kept our word.
We agreed. We'd all be in line. So that the men would know we meant business and know that we kept our word.
I know we agreed to keep this between ourselves, but the time has arrived...
And we agreed that if either one of us ever became single again we should try to meet someone else to share our life with.
You still need to pay me what we agreed on.
This isn't even half of what we agreed on.
No. I know what we agreed, but before I go, I have to tell her.
You know, this isn't necessarily what I had anticipated when we agreed to meet.
Whatever deal you think you made with her, she'll betray it in a second to get what she wants.
No, you were supposed to be a parent and do what we agreed to do, which was nothing.
No, he, um... wasn't where he was supposed to be.
He owes me some cash. And no bullshit or I'll kill him !
I want my goddamn money now!
